songs.title: Little Monsters
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When they're young
All Little Monsters
Learn that they're scary
Ugly, stupid, shunned by Cupid
Overweight & hairy

[Verse 2]
But every Monster needs to find
That secret deep inside
That transforms Dr. Jekyll into
Sexy, Mr. Hyde

[Chorus]
All my Monsters are beautiful
Disco Stutiful
Square rootiful
Old cutiful

[Post-Chorus]
Monsters don't need implants
Or a bitching Monster car
Monsters only need to love
The Monsters, that they are

[Hook]
Ooh, yeah, yeah
Gaga, dada, jawa
Peace!

[Hook]

Gaga, dada, jawa
Peace!
